definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: There are commonly used, "secretory otitis media, " the word, that is, in this way.
sentences.chinese: 还有常用的“分泌性中耳炎”一词，就是这样产生的。

sentences.english: Sound transmission in middle ear and microphonic potential.
sentences.chinese: 中耳传音功能和微音器电位。

sentences.english: The most common cause of perforation is otitis media .
sentences.chinese: 最常见的原因是穿孔性中耳炎。

sentences.english: Otitis media is usually caused by the common cold.
sentences.chinese: 中耳炎是通常所造成的普通感冒。

sentences.english: Pertaining to the ossicles in the middle ear.
Objective To analyze the status of tympanic membranes(TMs) and middle ears after tympanostomy tube insertions in children with otitis media with effusion(OME).
sentences.chinese: 目的随访分析儿童分泌性中耳炎鼓膜置管后的状况。

sentences.english: From the eardrum, sound travels through the middle ear.
sentences.chinese: 声波经过耳鼓，然后穿越中耳。

sentences.english: Objective In order to investigate the relation of curative effect with tympanostomy tubes.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨用鼓室置管治疗分泌性中耳炎的影响因素。

sentences.english: Eustachian tube function can be restored so that is conducive to healing of otitis media.
sentences.chinese: 能够让咽鼓管的功能得到恢复，有利于中耳炎的痊愈。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of hyperbaric therapy on endolymphatic hydrops in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中耳加压治疗是否可抑制豚鼠内淋巴积水。

sentences.english: Objective To simplify the preservative method of auris media transplanting materials.
sentences.chinese: 寻找简化中耳移植材料的保存方法。

sentences.english: The middle ear is a small pocket of air behind the eardrum.
sentences.chinese: 中耳就是骨膜后面的一个小气袋。

sentences.english: Otitis refers to inflammation of the ear, and media means middle.
sentences.chinese: 中耳炎是指发炎的耳朵，和媒体手段中东。

sentences.english: To explore the clinical meaning of "C" tympanum figure in secretory otitis media.
sentences.chinese: 探讨“C”型鼓室图在分泌性中耳炎的临床意义。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Sinupret on acute secretory otitis media.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察仙璐贝治疗急性分泌性中耳炎的临床疗效。

definition: external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
ossicles (of the middle ear)/three ossicles, acting as levers to amplify sound, namely: stapes or stirrup bone 鐙骨|镫骨, incus or anvil bone 砧骨, malleus or hammer bone 錘骨|锤骨
chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)
ossicles (in the middle ear)/also written 聽小骨|听小骨
